Articles.Content:
Greetings space enthusiasts.

I'm surprised nobody has mentioned this yet but Ariane flight VA213 is launched at 23:30 CEST tonight. It will be delivering ATV-4 'Albert Einstein' to the ISS.

For those who are interested in watching the launch it is available here:

http://spaceinvideos.esa.int/esalive

Just thought I'd let people who wouldn't otherwise know and are interested get the chance to catch this.

Cheers!
